name: Spacer Arcadia
description:
When The Console Window Appears Just Click On Close Please. Thank You And I Hope You Have Fun

An Arcade Space Shooter (Shoot'Em'Up)

Destroy All The Asteroids, Before They Destroy You!!

How Long Will You Survive!!!

(My First Game)

Controls

WASD To Move

Arrow Keys To Move

Left Mouse Button To Shoot

Left Control To Shoot
